parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the simulation application.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: The sources of the simulation application. (dict) --- Information about a source configuration. s3Bucket (string) --- The Amazon S3 bucket name. s3Key (string) --- The s3 object key. architecture (string) --- The target processor architecture for the application.

nested_params.name: architecture
nested_params.description: The target processor architecture for the application.

parameters.name: simulationSoftwareSuite
parameters.description: The simulation software suite used by the simulation application. name (string) --- The name of the simulation software suite. SimulationRuntime is the only supported value. version (string) --- The version of the simulation software suite. Not applicable for SimulationRuntime.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the simulation software suite. SimulationRuntime is the only supported value.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: The version of the simulation software suite. Not applicable for SimulationRuntime.

parameters.name: robotSoftwareSuite
parameters.description: The robot software suite used by the simulation application. name (string) --- The name of the robot software suite. General is the only supported value. version (string) --- The version of the robot software suite. Not applicable for General software suite.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the robot software suite. General is the only supported value.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: The version of the robot software suite. Not applicable for General software suite.

parameters.name: renderingEngine
parameters.description: The rendering engine for the simulation application. name (string) --- The name of the rendering engine. version (string) --- The version of the rendering engine.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the rendering engine.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: The version of the rendering engine.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map that contains tag keys and tag values that are attached to the simulation application. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The object that contains the Docker image URI used to create your simulation application. uri (string) --- The Docker image URI for either your robot or simulation applications.

nested_params.name: uri
nested_params.description: The Docker image URI for either your robot or simulation applications.
